description:
Thought i’d share this well made animation showing what technology has caused ... it’s true. Technology feeds our deepest desires, it’s designed to snatch as much attention from you as possible, and supply you with a constant dose of dopamine until you’re pretty much addicted.
This was originally and advert for a company called reMarkble, but i cut the end prt out as it wasn’t suitable aha.
